strapiPost.title: Pump Up The Bike Tires For The Square 2 Square Spring Ride This Saturday
strapiPost.content:
May is National Bike Month, and what better way to celebrate than the Square 2 Square Spring Ride this Saturday, May 6, beginning at 7a from Walker Park in Fayetteville?

  • Let's roll: The trek from Walker Park in Fayetteville to Lawrence Plaza in Bentonville is about 24 miles. Event organizers will offer shuttles, multiple rest stops, and on-trail aid stations, so you've got support whether you're racing a friend or just out for a casual roll.
  • Better together: Square 2 Square rides are hosted twice yearly by the Fayetteville and Bentonville Parks & Recs, drawing cyclists from Northwest Arkansas together to enjoy the beautiful Razorback Greenway.

Online registration ends Wednesday, May 3. Sign up before it's too late HERE.
